text: Pterophorus ceraunia is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is mostly white with distinct black fringe markings. The larvae feed on Merremia hederacea and Oldenlandia corymbosa. ==References== ceraunia Category:Insects of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths described in 1969
title: Pterophorus ceraunia
